title: The Lure of the Sea
description: The history of the sea, people who travel across it, live alongside or in the midst of it, or simply seek it out. Topics include imperialism, maritime commerce, port cities, littoral societies, piracy, tourism, popular culture. 4 lectures. Fulfills GE D5 except for History majors.
prerequisites: Completion of GE Area A and one course in from Area D1, D2 or D3
